name: CANNONZONE (Jam entry)
description:
CANNONZONE is my entry for the ScoreSpace Jam #15.

The theme is: ONE BULLET
I have interpreted the theme as "ONE BULLET TYPE" so in this game I added only one tipe of bullet, a cannon ball!

The goal of the game is to push the button in the middle of the room. Doing this increases the score, but at a cost: the cannon will shoot and all the shots will never leave the room!

How many can you shot and avoid? Post your high score!

CREDITS:
- tileset: https://opengameart.org/content/omega-team
- player spritehseet: https://opengameart.org/content/mechanic-animated
- sound effects: jsfxr
- music: done by me
